T02D2830:175b-0: @175b * // bde bar gshegs pa padmo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2830:175b-1: de la rdo rje 'dzin pa gang zhig slob ma
T02D2830:175b-2: phan gdags 'dod pas blo dang ldan pa'i gang zag
T02D2830:175b-3: don du gnyer ba dang bcas pa gang glo bur
T02D2830:175b-4: du lhags pa'am gnyug mar gnas pa yin kyang rung
T02D2830:175b-5: ste / dul bas mdun du bdar bar gyur pa de dag la /
T02D2830:175b-6: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs padmo dam pa can gyi
T02D2830:175b-7: byin gyis rlabs kyis snying gi padmo kha phye bas
T02D2830:175b-8: shes rab gsal po bskyed pa'i cho ga 'di dran
T02D2830:175b-10: skal ldan skye bo lhags pa na //
T02D2830:175b-11: der ni de ma thag tu de //
T02D2830:175b-12: pam brjod pas ni padmar bskyed //
T02D2830:175b-13: de yi snying yang de bzhin no //
T02D2830:175b-14: de la snying gi padmo ni //
T02D2830:175b-15: 'dab brgyad dkar po zlum pos te //
T02D2830:175b-16: dbus su hr'i: yig gis mtshan pa //
T02D2830:175b-17: spyi bor thig le sum brtsegs pa'o //
T02D2830:175b-18: dkar dmar bdud rtsi nam mkha'i mdog / rim bzhin rab tu dang bar bsam //
T02D2830:175b-19: smin mtshams nas zug snying gi dkyil //
T02D2830:175b-20: rtsa mchog sbu gu dkar zangs so //
T02D2830:175b-21: mkhas pa rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ba dag / byams sogs tshad med las skyes pa'i //
T02D2830:175b-23: spyan ras gzigs su myur bar bskyed //
T02D2830:175b-24: spyan gsum 'dzum pa'i mdangs dkar ldan //
T02D2830:175b-26: btsun mo gnyis kyis sku brten cing //
T02D2830:175b-27: rnga yab dkar g-yob dgyes bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2830:175b-28: de rjes gzhan la phan brtson pa'i //
T02D2830:175b-29: yid kyis de yi don bsgrub phyir //
T02D2830:175b-30: rnam gus pa yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2830:175b-31: bdag gi dgos pa lha mchog reg / de bas de la gsol btab pas //
T02D2830:175b-32: spyan drangs bdag nyid la bstim bya //
T02D2830:175b-33: de nas phyag g-yas chos 'chad kyi //
T02D2830:175b-34: mthil skyes ma las yongs gyur pa //
T02D2830:175b-35: nyi ma rdo rje snying po can //
T02D2830:175b-36: dbyangs dang gsal byed kyis brgyan bsam //
T02D2830:175b-37: hr'i: bcas sngags phreng gnyis brjod pas //
T02D2830:175b-38: nyi 'od tsha zhing rab rno yi //
T02D2830:175b-41: de las thog mar dkar thig le //
T02D2830:175b-42: pha yi sa bon zhu bar bshad //
T02D2830:175b-43: dmar po ma yi sa bon te //
T02D2830:175b-44: de bzhin mkha' 'dra kun gzhir bzhed //
T02D2830:176a-0: de mthar zhu ba'i thig le'i @176a * //
T02D2830:176a-2: dbyer med phan tshun rnam 'dren pa //
T02D2830:176a-3: bde chen 'od gsal rnam mi rtog / blo gros padmo rab rgyas gsungs //
T02D2830:176a-4: cho ga'i rgyal po dam pa 'di //
T02D2830:176a-5: gang gang skal bar ldan pa'i mthus //
T02D2830:176a-6: brtse ldan gus pas sngon song ba //
T02D2830:176a-7: de yi thos sogs rnam dag 'phel //
